Question: 3R INNOVATION INC CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
3R INNOVATION INC

Product: Q Revo series robot vacuums

- Features the new FlexiArm Design for efficient cleaning performance
- Equipped with 7000Pa suction to lift away dirt and debris
- Multifunctional Dock 2.0 enables automatic emptying, refilling, drying, and washing
- Utilizes hot water re-wash and re-mop setting for floor sanitization

Product: BMind Smart Mirror

- Integrates AI and natural language processing to analyze user sentiment
- Provides light therapy sessions, guided meditations, and self-affirmations
- Adapts to user's mood and offers personalized content
- Live demo showcases encouraging responses and mood-enhancing features

Product: Smart Bridge MZ1

- Serves as a bridge between Matter standard and Zigbee protocol
- Enables integration of Zigbee devices into the Matter system
- Offers pre-matching services for simplified setup
- Provides a one-stop smart home management solution with customized kits
